title: Voices of veterans and the debate on sugar
itunes:title: Voices of veterans and the debate on sugar
itunes:subtitle: Second World War veterans describe their experiences of a three month forced march and Richard Huzzey explains how sugar caused fierce debate in Victorian Britain.
description:
Second World War veterans describe their experiences of a three month forced march and Richard Huzzey explains how sugar caused fierce debate in Victorian Britain.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
